detaileddescription.para: A matrix product state for two sites , A and B, and a center bond. In Vidal Canonical Form $\Lambda^A\Gamma^A \Lambda^C \Gamma^B\Lambda^B$.
Left environment block used for variance calculation
Right environment block used for variance calculation

Contract the MPS of current position $n$ into the left and right environments $L$ and $R$, i.e. Lblock and Rblock. \[ L \leftarrow L \Lambda^B_{n-1} \Gamma^A_n W \Lambda^B_{n-1} (\Gamma^A_n)^* \] \[ R \leftarrow R \Gamma^B_{n+1} \Lambda^B_{n+1} W (\Gamma^B_{n+1})^* \Lambda^B_{n+1} \]

memberdef.definition: template Eigen::Matrix< double, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > class_infinite_state::get_H_local_matrix< double >
memberdef.name: get_H_local_matrix

memberdef.definition: template Eigen::Matrix< double, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > class_infinite_state::get_H_local_sq_matrix< double >
memberdef.name: get_H_local_sq_matrix

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 4 > &Lblock2_, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &Lblock_, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 4 > &MPO_A, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 1 > &LA, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &GA, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 1 > &LC, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &GB, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 1 > &LB, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 4 > &MPO_B, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 3 > &Rblock_, const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 4 > &Rblock2_)
memberdef.name: set_superblock

detaileddescription.para: Swap the roles of A and B. Used in the infinite-DMRG stage.

briefdescription.para: This class contains the Hamiltonian MPO, current wave function MPS, left and right environment blocks and routines to contract, diagonalize, truncate and update them.
